name: Strange Mom Neighbor In Town
description:
Since your mom has returned to this crazy town, she has started acting strange. She lives in the neighborhood in a biggest mansion. Sneak into her mansion to see what she is upto. Solve the puzzle of your angry strange mother's activities. Break in to her house when she is not home, take things with you for further investigation. Be secretive and cautious else you will face the anger of your mother. Be smart and quick. She is been acting strange for a long time, suddenly things got strange and you decided to take things in your hand and enter her house, which turns out to be a scary task.
Monitor her in and out timings, when she came home and when she go out for supermarkets. She has a high tech security system installed on her mansion. Wait outside and when she came out of her house get in before the doors get shut automatically. Get into the main hall and see if you find anything useful. Search in the main hall, kitchen and her bedroom. Collect the useful things. Beware, there can be traps or things like that. Get into the gymnasium and collect a volleyball. It's a huge and old house. So you will have to take every step carefully. The house is like a maze, once you enter it it's difficult to get out.

Feature
Realistic mysterious house environment
Immersive 3D graphics
Realistic sounds
Fill with thrill and mystery
Missions to complete
Amazing game play
